header.subtitle: Simplify your Turkey residence permit process with trusted experts, transparent guidance, and proven results.

expertGuidance.title: Experienced Immigration Experts
expertGuidance.shortDesc: Decade of expertise you can trust
expertGuidance.fullDesc: Our licensed immigration consultants bring over 10 years of experience helping individuals and families secure residence permits across Turkey — guiding you through every legal and procedural detail with confidence.

documentSupport.title: Complete Document Handling
documentSupport.shortDesc: We manage the paperwork for you
documentSupport.fullDesc: From preparing and verifying your documents to certified translations and apostille services — we take care of every requirement so your application is always accurate, complete, and ready for submission.

legalCompliance.title: Legally Secure Applications
legalCompliance.fullDesc: Each application is reviewed by our legal advisors to ensure full compliance with Turkish immigration regulations — minimizing errors, avoiding penalties, and protecting your legal standing.

caseManager.title: Dedicated Case Manager
caseManager.fullDesc: You'll have a personal case manager who stays in touch, keeps you updated, and resolves any questions quickly — ensuring a stress-free and transparent process from start to finish.

fastProcessing.title: Efficient & Fast Processing
fastProcessing.shortDesc: Save time with our optimized system
fastProcessing.fullDesc: Our established coordination with government offices and efficient document workflows help speed up your application process — often reducing waiting times by up to 40% compared to standard procedures.

successRate.title: Proven Success & Client Satisfaction
successRate.fullDesc: With over 5,000 approved residence permit applications and a 98% success rate, our proven record reflects our commitment to accuracy, reliability, and client satisfaction.
